<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.70</value></part><part><name>Game Version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Vehicle Loadouts </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Returns ammo count on given pylon.
Returns false ([[Boolean]]) on failure.</value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle '''ammoOnPylon''' pylon</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> pylon: [[String]] or [[Number]] - The name or the index of the pylon </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] or [[Boolean]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ammoCount = ([[vehicle]] [[player]]) [[ammoOnPylon]] "pylon1";</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[hint]] [[str]] (([[vehicle]] [[player]]) '''ammoOnPylon''' "pylonCenter");</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>


____________________________________________________________________________________________
